Toruku Avatar:
Glory to the Orkam! My name is Toruka, I train the Orcs in their traditional Kawat martial art. Kavat turns a warrior's body into a dangerous weapon. The orcs that own Kavat do not use swords or spears. In battle they use only the strength and speed of their body.
God Paagrio teaches that the strongest in the world can only be achieved through endless work on oneself. I took the path of this teaching and, having rejected all worldly joys, I devote myself to training in this remote plain.
